short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps you up to date with live streams by Harmful Opinions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps guarantee you never miss a Harmful Opinions stream on Twitch. By default it will notify you every time he goes live and alert you to special stream events not held at the regular time. It also features the option to automatically open the stream in a new browser tab when he goes live, if you wish to enable it.
